text: @BreitbartNews I just can't believe, that Governor Cuomo, would risk the health & well being of elderly patients at the Nursing Homes by, admitting COVID-19 patients, it's just outrageous!! Now, he will have to live with his egregious error in judgement, that cost many innocent lives. #COVID19
